snippet.title: 2010-11 Asia League regular season underway
snippet.description: , a non-Japanese team enters the season as the defending champion. South Korean entry Anyang Halla captured the crown in 2009-10. While the core group of Halla's championship squad remains intact and the club enters the season as the team to beat, there are three other clubs that can be considered legitimate contenders. "Apart from our club, all the other clubs made significant upgrades, especially...
